comment: Horrible Communication. The videos are very general he office hours are useless, avoid this professor at all costs and grading is very weird and takes a long time to grade

Professor Marks was the easiest math class EVER! She may not be the most pleasant, but it is an easy A. I recieved a very high A in her class and did little work. Only one section was hard. She isn't always helpful but the class was easy. And she doesn't deduct points based on attendance.

Avoid this woman at all costs. She is literally the worst professors I've ever had. Unhelpful, unfair, and clearly does not care for her students to pass. Attendance is mandatory, she deducts points from your grades for every absence-- excused or unexcused. Treats you like a high school student. Waste of your time.

She is no help...she writes the problem on the board then erases it....she even sometimes gets the problem wrong and asks her teachers aid to help her.....i dont think she can do TRIG without the teachers notes.....BAD TEACHER

This is the worst professor I have ever had! If you want to feel like you are in middle school, take this class! This professor does not allow laptops, books, or note writing in her  class. You must sit and stare. Also you must raise your hand if you would like to leave class early
